content: **update 18/11/2013 ** i have now updated the pattern this flower puzzle ball is based on the amish puzzle ball it comes apart into three segments that have to be assembled to form the ball the pattern is written using us crochet terminology but on the pattern page you can find a link to a chart comparing us/uk terminology i have included a lot of step-by-step photos to make the assembly of the ball as easy as possible absolutely no sewing involved unless you count working away three tails of yarn i have not included instructions for building the actual ball this is after all a puzzle for those of you who will be annoyed by this i have included a link to the original crochet amish puzzle ball where you can find links to elizzza s you-tube videos the building of the ball is shown at the end of the video if you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me i get a huge kick out of it take care and be proud of your craft dedri
